nodes.text: Gannaria was a terrestrial planet located in the Trilon sector of the Outer Rim Territories, positioned at the coordinates H-15 on the Standard Galactic Grid. It sat on a hyperspace route between the planet Batuu and astronomical object Zaddja. An illegal spice trade had existed on the planet for hundreds of years, and it was often visited by smugglers who used the town of Black Spire Outpost on Batuu as a waypoint. Gannaria also shared its name with the Gannarian Run hyperspace route.

It was the homeworld of the human First Order First Order stormtrooper HF-3311. Author and historian Eloc Throno listed Gannaria in his book Traveler's Guide to Batuu as a destination that could be reached with a short flight from Batuu, but noted that the planet saw fewer visitors in comparison.

Gannaria was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the Gannaria system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
